about_1: I'm a 20-year-old Italian passionate about IT and programming.
about_2: I have some experience in front-end development and enjoy working with modern technologies.
about_3: Based in Footscray, Melbourne, I'm seeking opportunities to grow and learn in the tech industry.
about_4: My dream job is to build PCs or be a phone repair technician.
